data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 92,078 people in the state of Monte Cristi who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Monte Cristi, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Monte Cristi, Dominican Republic that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 12,032 believers in the state of Monte Cristi the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 12,032 believers in Monte Cristi.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Japanese people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Monte Cristi.
Spirit, please convict the believers in Monte Cristi, Dominican Republic to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Monte Cristi, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

location.name: Monte Cristi
location.cities_list: San Fernando de Monte Cristi, Villa Vásquez, Las Matas de Santa Cruz, Castañuelas, Hatillo Palma
location.cities_list_w_pop: San Fernando de Monte Cristi (17,001), Villa Vásquez (11,642), Las Matas de Santa Cruz (10,218), Castañuelas (4,209), Hatillo Palma (3,574)
